name: LeakForums | The Olympus CSS
description: The Olympus CSS found in the CSS Engine section.
additional_info: This CSS contains the CSS of the official Olympus CSS from LeakForums.net For any questions, contact VirtusGraphics on LeakForums through PM. This CSS may not be updated as it will in the official thread, so that is preferred to use. If you use this CSS from userstyles.org, I would appriciate that leave your mark on the thread!
